main event: On July 7, 1966, a civilian reported observing one unidentified flying object in Langhorne, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering without any sound for about 5 minutes before it accelerated out of sight in 2-3 seconds., The observer estimated the diameter of the object to be around 3 to 3.5 feet., The sighting occurred on a clear night with no moon present., The document includes various annotations and observations but no photographic evidence., A separate note described a large circular object estimated to be about 30 feet.
